title: The Koh-i-Noor
itunes:title: The Koh-i-Noor
itunes:subtitle: Historian and author William Dalrymple and BBC journalist Anita Anand join us to discuss their new history of the Koh-i-Noor, the famed Indian diamond, which was controversially brought to Britain in the 19th century
description:
Historian and author William Dalrymple and BBC journalist Anita Anand join us to discuss their new history of the Koh-i-Noor, the famed Indian diamond, which was controversially brought to Britain in the 19th century

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
